You have liked the song. Nice!

reaction_tip.title: N I C E

about.content:
Welcome to Nightwave Plaza!

Nightwave Plaza is a free 24/7 online vaporwave radio station. The broadcast also includes some future funk and experimental genres. We hope you enjoy.

Join our community Discord server!

Submissions

Please use this form to send music for broadcasting.

Contact Information

Please send any enquiries you may have to {mail_to}.

Any updates or upcoming maintenance on Nightwave Plaza can be found on our official Twitter account: {twitter_username}.

Nightwave Plaza can also be found on YouTube, Facebook, VK, Last.fm and TuneIn.

Streaming Links

You are able to listen to Nightwave Plaza's broadcasts through your favorite music player instead of a browser! Use the following links:

Playlists
m3u file for Winamp
pls file for foobar2k

Streams
http://radio.plaza.one/ogg (opus / 96kbps)
http://radio.plaza.one/ogg_low (opus / 64kbps)
http://radio.plaza.one/mp3 (mp3 / 128kbps)
http://radio.plaza.one/mp3_low (mp3 / 96kbps)

Privacy policy
